text: (yusuhp) avarkalukku ventiya porul (taniyankalaic) cittam ceytu kotutta potu, (avarkalai nokki)"unkal tantai valic cakotaranai (marumurai ninkal inku varumpotu) ennitam alaittu varunkal. Niccayamaka nan unkalukku (taniyankalai nirappamaka) alantu kotuttataiyum, viruntupacaram ceyvatil nan"cirantavan" enpataiyum ninkal parkkavillaiya
